SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.backend

Class Budget

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.backend.Budget
@Entity public class Budget extends Object
Represents a budget, contains a list of expenses, a list of incomes, and a list of categories.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Budget()
    Default constructor for Budget.
    Budget(String budgetName)
    Constructor for Budget with only a name, creates a budget with creation date as start date, and creation date + 30 days as end date.
    Budget(String budgetName, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
    Constructor for Budget with a specified name, start date, and end date.

  • Constructor Details

    • Budget

      public Budget(String budgetName, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructor for Budget with a specified name, start date, and end date.
      Parameters:
      budgetName - the name of the budget.
      startDate - the start date of the budget.
      endDate - the end date of the budget.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the budget name is invalid or taken. Or if the interval length is negative.

    • Budget

      public Budget(String budgetName)
      Constructor for Budget with only a name, creates a budget with creation date as start date, and creation date + 30 days as end date.
      Parameters:
      budgetName - the name of the budget.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the budget name is invalid or taken.
